title: ninunera nammitirA
sahitya:
ninunera nammitirA nIrajanAbhA


anupallavi

  kanikaramu nE nannu grakkuna brOtuvani


caraNam 1    sharaNAgata vatsaluDanivini nE sharaNu joccina nanu saraguna brOtuvani
    caraNam 2    pApapu rOgamu pAradoli nannu nI dApuna jErcci ika dayayunci brOtuvani
    caraNam 3    gOpAla dAsunipai kOpamu cAlinci shrI pAvanamUrti sirulicci brOtuvani
